title: Elementary Mathematics Game Design Workshop Through Strategic Reasoning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary math concepts (addition/subtraction/multiplication) and experience with simple board games
context.additional_context: Course enhancing pre-service teachers’ and elementary education enthusiasts’ ability to create classroom-applicable mathematics games

learning_goals: Learners can design game rules based on given mathematical concepts (fractions/geometry) incorporating strategic reasoning elements
Learners can present three or more criteria for evaluating how each game choice element connects to mathematical thinking processes
Learners can collaboratively develop an educational board game prototype combining digital and analog expression methods

resources: Cardboard, Dice, Smartphone App Template, and Sample Math Game Kit

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
